entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:04 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 10:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Wet snow inland. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm inland. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning except 60 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy mixed with wet snow. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Snowfall amount 10 cm inland. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 late in the evening except 70 over exposed coastal sections late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
